Library Module API¶

mainwindow.py¶

class lib.mainwindow.MainWindow(app, project_path=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Variables

  • app (MyApp) – Object MyApp.

  • project (Project) –

    A Mainwindow object contains only one Project object.

    It is the data base.

  • menutopbar (MyMenuBar) –

  • wg_canvas (MyCanvas) –

    A self-defined QWidget component placed on the center of the mainwindow.

    It contains most of the ploting functions.

  • dwg_data (DockWidget_Data) –

    A self-defined QDockWidget placed on the left area by default.

    It contains a list of imported files and several functions interacting with the canvases in wg_canvas.

  • dwg_canvasLayout (DockWidget_CanvasLayout) –

    A self-defined QDockWidget placed on the left area by default.

    It contains functions of switching canvas layout mode, customizing canvas setting and post-processing.

initUI()[source]¶

Initial mainwindow’s user interface base on data in attribute project.

btn_processingDlg_handleClicked()[source]¶

This function connect with QPushButton component in dockwg_canvas_setting.

When the button is clicked, execute OperationDialog and pop up a dialog window.

btn_axis_setting_handleClicked()[source]¶

This function connect with QPushButton component btn_axis_setting.

When the button is clicked, execute CanvasSetting_Dialog and pop up a dialog window.

It is used for customizing which curve types CurveType would be drawn on a canvas. Each canvas has main axis and sub axis.

After dialog window closed, update related component with new setting.

append_file(file)[source]¶

Append a new imported file to attributes project, and also to the list in DockWidget component dwg_data.

Parameters

file (FileData) – A FileData object generated from the imported file.

delete_files(filenames_to_del)[source]¶

Delete files from attributes project, and also the data on the list in DockWidget component dwg_data.

Parameters

file (FileData) – A FileData object user intends to delete.

clear_files()[source]¶

Delete all the files in attributes project, and also clear curves data on the treelist in DockWidget component dwg_data.

save_file()[source]¶

Save project to file.

If this project is “Untitled”, which is the default name for a new project, it would execute QFileDialog with a dialog window popping up. User can determain a new name and where to save.

Otherwise, it would be updated to the origin project file.

save_file_as()[source]¶

Execute QFileDialog and pop up a dialog window letting user to determain a new name and where to save.

dockwg_data.py¶

class lib.dockwg_data.DockWidget_Data(mainwindow, position)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDockWidget

Variables

  • mainwindow (MainWindow) – The MainWindow object that this DockWidget_Data object belongs.

  • filePool (FilePool) – A QWidget component contains a list of imported file components. It contains functions of interaction between file components.

initUI()[source]¶

Initial User Interface.

append_file(fileData)[source]¶

Append a new imported file to component filepool.

Parameters

fileData (FileData) – A FileData object generated from the imported file.

delete_files(filenames)[source]¶

Removing files from component filepool.

Parameters

filenames (List[str]) – A list of filenames user intends to delete.

load_project(project)[source]¶

Retrieve files from a specific project and append them to component filepool.

Parameters

project (Project) – A Project object.

btn_importDlg_handleClicked()[source]¶

This function connect with Import button.

When the button is clicked, execute ImportDialog and pop up a dialog window.

dockwg_canvas_layout.py¶

class lib.dockwg_canvas_layout.Draggable_Label(text, idx)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QLabel

Self-defined Qlabel that use to represent app’s canvas components on DockWidget_CanvasLayout. User can drag this label onto the canvas component, which could change the arrangement in the layout.

mouseMoveEvent(self, QMouseEvent)[source]¶

class lib.dockwg_canvas_layout.DockWidget_CanvasLayout(mainwindow, Position)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDockWidget

Initial User Interface.

set_canvas_mode(mode)[source]¶

Set canvas layout mode, Main/UpAndDown/Quater/MainwithThreeSmall.

>> Quater/MainwithThreeSmall are not availibale for ver_0.2.0

Parameters

mode (str) – The canvas layout mode user intends to set.
